<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scratch registers here with the EarlyClobber | Define | Implicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flags is used to persuade the register allocator and the machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verifier to accept the usage of this register. This has to be a real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register which has an UNDEF value but is dead after the instruction which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is unique among the registers chosen for the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The EarlyClobber flag has the semantic properties that the operand it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// attached to is clobbered before the rest of the inputs are read. Hence it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be unique among the operands to the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Define flag is needed to coerce the machine verifier that an Undef</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value isn&#39;t a problem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Dead flag is needed as the value in scratch isn&#39;t used by any other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction. Kill isn&#39;t used as Dead is more precise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The implicit flag is here due to the interaction between the other flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the machine verifier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For correctness purpose, a new pseudo is introduced here. We need this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new pseudo, so that FastRegisterAllocator does not see an ll/sc sequence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that is spread over &gt;1 basic blocks. A register allocator which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// introduces (or any codegen infact) a store, can violate the expectations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the hardware.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An atomic read-modify-write sequence starts with a linked load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction and ends with a store conditional instruction. The atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read-modify-write sequence fails if any of the following conditions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur between the execution of ll and sc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; A coherent store is completed by another process or coherent I/O</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     module into the block of synchronizable physical memory containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     the word. The size and alignment of the block is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     implementation-dependent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; A coherent store is executed between an LL and SC sequence on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     same processor to the block of synchornizable physical memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     containing the word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PtrCopy = <a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>.createVirtualRegister(<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>.getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scratch registers here with the EarlyClobber | Define | Dead | Implicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flags are used to coerce the register allocator and the machine verifier to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The EarlyClobber flag has the semantic properties that the operand it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// attached to is clobbered before the rest of the inputs are read. Hence it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be unique among the operands to the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Define flag is needed to coerce the machine verifier that an Undef</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Dead flag is needed as the value in scratch isn&#39;t used by any other</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      Calling Convention Implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Implement a generic logic using tblgen that can support this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mips O32 ABI rules:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i32 - Passed in A0, A1, A2, A3 and stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f32 - Only passed in f32 registers if no int reg has been used yet to hold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       an argument. Otherwise, passed in A1, A2, A3 and stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f64 - Only passed in two aliased f32 registers if no int reg has been used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       yet to hold an argument. Otherwise, use A2, A3 and stack. If A1 is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       not used, it must be shadowed. If only A3 is available, shadow it and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       go to stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vXiX - Received as scalarized i32s, passed in A0 - A3 and the stack.</span></CodeLine>
